p: Illumina sequences were mapped to the publicly available VSV genome (GI:9627229) using BWA v0.7.12 (Li & Durbin, 2009) with default parameters. Consensus sequences and minority‐variant tables were generated using the QUASR pipeline (Watson et al., 2013) with a minimum variant frequency cutoff of 0.01. Only polymorphisms detected in both technical sequencing replicates of each sample were retained to reduce false‐positive results arising during the sequencing process.
